c:simple-property.name: augeasModuleName
c:simple-property.description: the name of the Augeas module/lens to use for loading and updating this resource's configuration

c:simple-property.name: configurationFilesInclusionPatterns
c:simple-property.description: the absolute path of the samba configuration

c:simple-property.name: mynetworks
c:simple-property.description: List of clients that can relay mail

c:simple-property.name: mydestinations
c:simple-property.description: Space delimited list of domains for which server will accept delivered. Postfix must be restarted.

c:simple-property.name: inet_interfaces
c:simple-property.description: Network interfaces that Postfix will bind to

c:simple-property.name: smtpd_banner
c:simple-property.description: SMTP Banner (RFC requires hostname and ESMTP prompt)

c:simple-property.name: disable_vrfy_command
c:simple-property.description: Supress Response to SMTP VRFY requests by default

c:simple-property.name: smtpd_helo_required
c:simple-property.description: Force clients to start connection with HELO

c:simple-property.name: smtp_always_send_ehlo
c:simple-property.description: Always send a correct EHLO greeting

c:simple-property.name: in_flow_delay
c:simple-property.description: Number of seconds to delay before accepting messages if arriving faster than delivering

c:simple-property.name: local_destination_concurrency_limit
c:simple-property.description: Number of messages delivered simultaneously to the same local recipient
